abstract: Soon after Johnson & Johnson recalled a troubled hip implant, an internal review found that the company’s orthopedic unit had used inadequate engineering standards.
snippet: Soon after Johnson & Johnson recalled a troubled hip implant, an internal review found that the company’s orthopedic unit had used inadequate engineering standards.
lead_paragraph: A review conducted internally by Johnson & Johnson soon after it recalled a troubled hip implant found that the company had not adequately assessed the device’s potential risks before it was used in more than 90,000 patients, court testimony on Thursday showed.

headline.main: Implant Risk Was Assessed Inadequately, Court Is Told
headline.print_headline: Implant Risk Was Assessed Inadequately, Court Is Told
